message_1: What is the isotope notation and identification of an atom with 16 protons and 18 neutrons?
message_2:
The isotope notation of an atom with 16 protons and 18 neutrons is written as:

Sulfur-34 or ³⁴S

The identification of this atom is Sulfur (S), which has an atomic number of 16. The isotope has a mass number of 34 (16 protons + 18 neutrons).
